elements.name: Verify User can add an Address

user fill address form with below information
User click Add Your Address button

elements.name: Verify User can add an item to cart and place order without saved address and credit card

steps.name: User search for an item 'Apex Legends'
User click add to Cart button
the cart icon quantity should change to '2'
User click on Proceed to Checkout button
User click Add a new address link for shipping address
User fill new address form with below information
User click Add Your Address button
User click Add a credit card or Debit Card for Payment method
User fill Debit or credit card information
User click on Add your card button
User click on Place Your Order
a message should be displayed 'Order Placed, Thanks'
User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account

elements.name: Verify user can place order with saved card and address

steps.name: User search for an item 'Apex Legends'
User click add to Cart button
the cart icon quantity should change to '5'
User click on Proceed to Checkout button
User click on Place Your Order
a message should be displayed 'Order Placed, Thanks'
User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account

elements.name: Verify User can cancel the order

steps.name: User click on first order in list
User click on Cancel The Order button
User select the cancelation Reason 'Bought wrong item'
User click on Cancel Order button
a cancelation message should be displayed 'Your Order Has Been Cancelled'
User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account

elements.name: Verify User can Return the order

steps.name: User click on first order in list
User click on Return Items button
User select the Return Reason 'Item damaged'
User select the drop off service 'FedEx'
User click on Return Order button
a return message should be displayed 'Return was successfull'
User click on Sign in option
User should be logged in into Account

elements.name: Verify User can write a review on order placed

steps.name: User click on first order in list
User write Review headline 'Andrew Tate' and 'super duper product for watching movies, good for watching my videos'

arguments.val: 'super duper product for watching movies, good for watching my videos'

steps.name: User click Add your Review button
a review message should be displayed 'Your review was added successfully'
User click on Sign in option

elements.name: Verify user can sign in into Retail Application

steps.name: User should be logged in into Account
User click on Sign in option

elements.name: Verify user can create an account into Retail Website

steps.name: User click on Create New Account button
